means: 憎恨，厌恶( loathe的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: Deacon made no secret of his loathing of Bayldon.
sentence.Network_cn: 迪肯毫不掩饰自己对贝尔顿的憎恶。

sentence.Network_en: He regarded drug dealers with loathing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对贩毒分子深恶痛绝。

sentence.Network_en: She looked at him with loathing.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表B ... caterpillar n. 毛虫 loathing n. 讨厌, 嫌恶 cubes n. 立方体, 立方.

after the plan's thrashing by the House of Representatives on September 29th , spurred on by voters' loathing of " casino capitalism " , investors panicked .9月29日，在投票者们对“赌场资本主义”厌恶情绪的刺激下，众议院否决了这项计划，随后，投资者陷入了恐慌。
Length Begets loathing ., 冗长令人生厌.

although knew oneself loathes extremely extremely repeatedly lives so unceasingly , loathing this irrevocable custom , loathes this not to have color deserted monotonously .尽管知道自己非常非常地厌恶如此不断重复地生活，厌恶地这一成不变的习惯，厌恶着这单调没有颜色的空寂。

list.abs: they loathe Bronka Ginsberg but aren't about to cross her .他们厌恶勃隆卡?京斯贝格，但不想和她作对。
ooh - did i say that i loathe you oh ., 我曾经说过厌恶你么.
I tell you I loathe and abhor my husband and I utterly despise him ., 我告诉你 , 我厌恶 , 憎恨我的丈夫 , 我彻底地看不起他!
I loathe you !, 我讨厌你!
loath什么意思及同义词... ... lief or loath 不管愿不愿意 nothing loath 很愿意,很乐意 loath to depart 送别的曲子.
loath的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... be loath for him to go 不愿意他去 nothing loath 很愿意, 很高兴.

entry.def: Loathing is a feeling of great dislike and disgust.

example.ex: Deacon made no secret of his loathing of Bayldon...
example.tran: 迪肯毫不掩饰自己对贝尔顿的憎恶。

example.ex: She looked at him with loathing.

sentences.en: She felt an intense loathing for her boss.

sentences.cn: 这起事件引起了大众的恐惧和厌恶。
